inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking getBot.

name.description: Name of the bot. The name is case sensitive.

version.description: Version or alias of the bot.

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getBot.

checksum.description: Checksum of the bot used to identify a specific revision of the bot's `$LATEST` version.

childDirected.description: If this Amazon Lex Bot is related to a website, program, or other application that is directed or targeted, in whole or in part, to children under age 13 and subject to COPPA.

createdDate.description: Date that the bot was created.

detectSentiment.description: When set to true user utterances are sent to Amazon Comprehend for sentiment analysis.

enableModelImprovements.description: Set to true if natural language understanding improvements are enabled.

failureReason.description: If the `status` is `FAILED`, the reason why the bot failed to build.

id.description: The provider-assigned unique ID for this managed resource.

idleSessionTtlInSeconds.description: The maximum time in seconds that Amazon Lex retains the data gathered in a conversation.

lastUpdatedDate.description: Date that the bot was updated.

locale.description: Target locale for the bot. Any intent used in the bot must be compatible with the locale of the bot.

name.description: Name of the bot, case sensitive.

nluIntentConfidenceThreshold.description: The threshold where Amazon Lex will insert the AMAZON.FallbackIntent, AMAZON.KendraSearchIntent, or both when returning alternative intents in a PostContent or PostText response. AMAZON.FallbackIntent and AMAZON.KendraSearchIntent are only inserted if they are configured for the bot.

version.description: Version of the bot. For a new bot, the version is always `$LATEST`.

voiceId.description: Amazon Polly voice ID that the Amazon Lex Bot uses for voice interactions with the user.
